Recipes by Ingredients

Got ingredients but no idea what to cook? Let Cuvio's AI suggest delicious recipes based on what you already have in your kitchen.

How Recipe Discovery Works

Three simple steps to find your perfect recipe

1

Enter Your Ingredients

Tell Cuvio what ingredients you have available in your fridge, pantry, or freezer.

2

AI Finds Perfect Matches

Our AI analyzes your ingredients and suggests recipes that use what you have, reducing waste.

3

Cook & Enjoy

Follow step-by-step instructions and enjoy a delicious meal made from your available ingredients.

Smart Recipe Features

Everything you need for stress-free cooking with AI-powered intelligence

AI Ingredient Matching

Find recipes that use your exact ingredients with smart substitutions that maintain flavor profiles.

Cooking Time Filters

Filter recipes by cooking time - from 15-minute quick meals to slow-cooked favorites.

Dietary Preferences

Get recipes that match your dietary needs - vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, keto, and more.

Serves Any Size

Seasonal Optimization

Prioritize seasonal and locally available ingredients for better taste, nutrition, and cost savings.

Smart Shopping Lists

Generate shopping lists for missing ingredients, organized by store section and optimized for efficiency.

AI Cooking Assistant

Get contextual cooking tips, techniques, and ingredient substitutions directly within recipes.

Nutrition Information

Get detailed macro and micronutrient information for every recipe with nutrition tips and insights.

Recipe Swapping

Easily swap any recipe for alternatives or choose from your favorites with automatic shopping list updates.

Seasonal & Location-Based Cooking

Cuvio optimizes your recipes for seasonal produce and local availability, ensuring better taste, nutrition, and value.

Why Seasonal Matters

Seasonal ingredients are not only more flavorful and nutritious, but they're also more affordable and environmentally sustainable. Cuvio's AI considers your location and the current season to prioritize the best available ingredients.
